backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three UI features, affected frontend files, and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend files, styles, Tailwind config, and empty hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and global styles defining a color system and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app implementing three-view flow (prompt, meme, title) with moving No button and styled final title screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles including pink-themed OKLCH palette, typography, animations, and hero title gradient effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point rendering App with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color system, extended radius and shadows, and accordion animations with several plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a web app's Yes/No flow, existing features, pending requests, and the requirement to display a large stylish title on a second screen.
